entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
